ModMetaData.name: [RH2] BCD: First Aid
ModMetaData.author: Chicken Plucker, Taranchuk
ModMetaData.description:
Save precious time during the golden hour of survival with this first aid mod!
"BCDs" also known as the Battlefield Casualty Drills are a series of emergency medical procedures for the basic soldier.
First aid allows your pawns to tend to downed casualties on the spot. If medical resources or a hospital bed is available nearby, the medic will utilize these before hastily performing first aid.
The following mod adds: - New right click option on downed pawns to "Perform first aid" - First aid tends to downed pawns without a bed - First aid will allow the medic to grab the nearest medicine resource, otherwise they will tend to the casualty with no medicine - Can be used on enemy pawns and friendlies - First aid tending speed is faster than normal tending, however the quality of tending is reduced
What is BCD? Battlefield Casualty Drills, medical procedures in the event of a casualty in combat.
What is First Aid? Medical treatment given to a casualty or injured person until further medical help is available
What's the difference between this mod, the 1.3 tending feature and the "Stabilize Here" mod? - First Aid tend speed is 200% faster (scaling is based on pawn's medical ability) - First Aid tend quality is -25% worse (scaling is based on pawn's medical ability) - Pawn searches for nearby medical items, or ones in their inventory (uses the highest quality of medicine, unless forbidden) - Presentation and art style
Combat Extended Compatible? Unknown.
Credits: Taranchuk - C# Linkolas - Author of "Stabilize Here"
